attributes.action: Get the UK back on track, give the British people jobs, give the needy the help they need, put money into education and the Health Service where it matters
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/joblessjobless/

We suggest you re-word your petition and ensure that it does not overlap with existing petitions. If you wish to write to the Prime Minister instead, contact details can be found here: http://www.number10.gov.uk/footer/contact-us
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
